parameters.name: BurstTableID
parameters.description: ID of the IMPACT Burst Table

parameters.name: SWEAModeID
parameters.description: ID of the SWEA instrument's mode

parameters.name: STEModeID
parameters.description: ID of the STE instrument's mode

parameters.name: SWEARate
parameters.description: Scaled SWEA count rate used in burst criteria calculation

parameters.name: STERate
parameters.description: Scaled STE LLD rate used in burst criteria calculation

parameters.name: MAGDelB
parameters.description: Scaled MAG delta B value used in burst criteria calculation

parameters.name: PLASTICDelV
parameters.description: Scaled PLASTIC delta V value used in burst criteria calculation

parameters.name: SWAVESNTDS
parameters.description: Scaled SWAVES NTDS value used in burst criteria calculation

parameters.name: SWAVESPlasma
parameters.description: Scaled SWAVES plasma power value used in burst criteria calculation

parameters.name: SWAVESHFR1
parameters.description: Scaled SWAVES HFR1 power value used in burst criteria calculation

parameters.name: SWAVESHFR2
parameters.description: Scaled SWAVES HFR2 power value used in burst criteria calculation
